If you're interested in something more recent, "American Sniper" is also an excellent choice. This biographical drama tells the powerful story of Chris Kyle, a Navy S.E.A.L. sniper who served in Iraq, and his struggles to adjust to civilian life after four tours of duty. Bradley Cooper gives a compelling performance as Kyle, bringing depth and nuance to this important true story.
